events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening of your application and resume has been completed successfully, and we would like to discuss your background further.
Thank you for your prompt reply. We are pleased to hear about your interest and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess your engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. Our engineering team was impressed with your coding skills and knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 23rd at 3 PM UTC to discuss your fit with company culture and work environment.
Your HR interview went well. We appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with our company values during the conversation.
We are pleased to extend you an official offer for the Software Engineer role, including the details of compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the offer. We are glad to hear that you find the terms satisfactory and are excited about the opportunity.
You have formally accepted the offer to join our engineering team. We look forward to your joining and contributing to exciting projects.
Your onboarding process has started successfully. Welcome aboard! We are excited to support you through your first days and beyond.
The hiring process is now complete and your employment officially begins. Congratulations and thank you for choosing to join our engineering team.
